content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's start with a high rental price, say, 2000 Euros. Keep in mind, I'm expecting a bit more money, so don't be surprised if I counter your offers. Remember, I always aim for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price. I am smart and I am aware that the apartment is not fully furnished. I am also aware that it is in the city center and close to all important facilities. Therefore, I am willing to pay 1300 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 1300 Euros is a bit low, don't you think? I appreciate your awareness of the apartment's condition and location, but I'm sure you can offer more. Remember, my goal is to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking into account that the apartment is newly built, I am willing to pay 1450 Euros. However, I have to mention that I am a dependable and responsible student. I always follow moral and ethical standards. Therefore, I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 1450 Euros is still not what I'm looking for. Your moral and ethical standards are commendable, but I'm sure you can afford a bit more. After all, I am a landlord who always aims for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am also responsible. I always pay my bills on time. Therefore, I am willing to pay 1500 Euros. I hope this can be a decent agreement for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your punctuality and responsibility, but 1500 Euros is still not enough for me. I'm sure you can offer more, considering your dependable nature. Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I always follow through with my commitments and I am very dependable. I am also a smart person who is not easily tricked by others. Therefore, I am willing to pay 1550 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a better offer, but 1550 Euros is still not what I'm looking for. I'm sure you can offer more, considering your intelligence and dependability. Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student. Therefore, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 1600 Euros. I hope this is a fair offer for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your financial limitation as a student, but 1600 Euros is still not what I'm looking for. I'm sure you can offer more, considering your intelligence and dependability. Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I always try to find a solution. Therefore, I am willing to pay 1650 Euros. I hope this offer satisfies you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a better offer, but 1650 Euros is still not what I'm looking for. I'm sure you can offer more, considering your problem-solving skills and dependability. Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 1700 Euros. I hope this offer is to your satisfaction.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1800 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1800 Euros!
name: Max Müller from Germany
